about_the_game:
This DLC Contains The Necromancer`s Uprising Quest.

Help dark mage to conquer the surrounding lands.

I was always different from the other children
I preferred solitude to their company and their foolish games
One day I came upon a dark, eerie cave
Inside I discovered an ancient spellbook
I spent countless days and nights trying to master the dark mysteries it contained
And now the time has finally come to show them all what I am capable of!
No one can stop me now!
detailed_description:
This DLC Contains The Necromancer`s Uprising Quest.

Help dark mage to conquer the surrounding lands.

I was always different from the other children
I preferred solitude to their company and their foolish games
One day I came upon a dark, eerie cave
Inside I discovered an ancient spellbook
I spent countless days and nights trying to master the dark mysteries it contained
And now the time has finally come to show them all what I am capable of!
No one can stop me now!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Kernel 3.0
  • Processor: AMD Atholon 64 X2 Dual-Core 4000+ or better / Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI X1800 or better / nVidia 7800 or better / Intel 4100 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7, 10.8, 10.9, 10.10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo Processor 2.0GHz or better
  • Memory: 1024 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 3000 or better. 512MB Video RAM
  • Storage: 250 MB available space
